callouts.pinNotes: Pin important notes to keep them at the top!
callouts.lockNotes: Lock notes to protect sensitive information.
callouts.voiceNotes: Use voice notes for quick capture on the go!
callouts.checklistMode: Create checklists to organize your tasks.
callouts.richText: Take a photo of text or upload an image with text to transcribe it to the note with AI.
callouts.shareNotes: Share your notes as text or images.
callouts.reminders: Set reminders to never forget important tasks.
callouts.search: Quickly find any note with powerful search.
callouts.multiSelect: Long press to select multiple notes.
callouts.voiceListKeywords: Say: 'new shopping list' and your list will be automatically created. Then add: 'remind me tomorrow at 9 am and you'll have a reminder on that same note.'
callouts.addToListKeywords: If you have a list created, add items by saying: add to this list, add, I also need, also add.

instructions.title: How to use the AI features

voiceNote.title: Quick Voice Note
voiceNote.description: How do we transcribe a quick note with voice? You can press and hold the icon of your app until the option appears, press it and the voice recording that will be transcribed directly begins.

voiceNoteInApp.title: Voice Note in App
voiceNoteInApp.description: Or within the app, press on Quick Voice Note, and it will start recording and then transcribe it to the note. Remember that you can record a list and also save a reminder. Example: "New Shopping list, milk, bread, cheese, tomatoes. and remind me tomorrow at 2pm". Also to an already created list you can add items by saying "Add", "Add to this list" and the item you want will be added to your list.

ocrFeature.title: OCR Text Recognition
ocrFeature.description: Also with AI you can transcribe text directly to the note either by taking a photo of a text or uploading an image with text, just by pressing the camera icon.

audioTranscription.title: Audio Transcription
audioTranscription.description: You can record long meetings and transcribe them with AI, first you record the meeting, then you will see that an audio will be recorded that you can play, and if you hold down the audio, the option to transcribe or delete it will be enabled, if you transcribe it it will automatically be added to that note.
